languages.text: {n}Он может выжить, но останется калекой. Слишком много мышечных тканей обуглено до кости — даже если тело сохранит хоть какую-то подвижность, боль станет его вечной спутницей. Моторика нарушена невосстановимо. Перед вами неизлечимый калека... в лучшем случае.{/n}

{n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Он может выжить, но останется калекой. Слишком много мышечных тканей обуглено до кости — даже если тело сохранит хоть какую-то подвижность, боль станет его вечной спутницей. Моторика нарушена невосстановимо. Перед вами неизлечимый калека... в лучшем случае.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A cripple or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

{n}There is a chance the man might live. But even if he does, it will be a crippled life of pain and misery. He will never be able to work as others can, which means he will have to turn to begging, forever scrounging for food. He will have no means of procuring simple medicine, which means that any disease will cling to his weakened body. The pain of his wounds will not go away until the day he dies.{/n}

{n}He may yet survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A cripple or a corpse — time will soon tell.{/n}

{n}There is a chance the man might live. But even if he does, it will be a crippled life of pain and misery. He will never be able to work as others can, which means he will have to turn to begging, forever scrounging for food. He will have no means of procuring simple medicine, and so any disease will cling to his weakened body. The pain of his wounds will linger until the day he dies.{/n}

{n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

{n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A cripple or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

{n}He may yet survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A cripple or a corpse — time will soon tell.{/n}

{n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il survivra peut-être, mais il restera infirme à vie. De trop nombreux muscles ont été brûlés jusqu'à l'os, et même s'il est encore capable de se mouvoir, il souffrira le martyre jusqu'à la fin de ses jours. Ses facultés motrices ont été irrémédiablement endommagées. Homme brisé ou condamné en sursis, seul le temps le dira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il survivra peut-être, mais il restera infirme à vie. De trop nombreux muscles ont été brûlés jusqu'à l'os, et même s'il est encore capable de se mouvoir, il souffrira le martyre jusqu'à la fin de ses jours. Ses facultés motrices ont été irrémédiablement endommagées. Homme brisé ou condamné en sursis, seul le temps le dira.{/n}

{n}L'homme a encore une chance de survivre, mais si vous le sauvez, vous le condamnerez à une vie de misère et de souffrance. Il ne pourra plus jamais travailler et n'aura donc d'autre choix que de mendier sa pitance. Son corps affaibli deviendra le terrain de jeu des maladies, dont il ne pourra jamais vraiment se débarrasser puisqu'il n'aura pas les moyens de se procurer ne serait-ce que les plus basiques des médicaments. Quant à ses blessures, elles le mettront à la torture jusqu'au jour de sa mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es posible que sobreviva, pero quedará lisiado de por vida. Tiene demasiados músculos carbonizados hasta el hueso; aun cuando conserve una movilidad parcial, el dolor le acompañará constantemente. Sus habilidades motoras han quedado dañadas de manera irreparable. El tiempo dirá si acaba siendo un tullido o un cadáver.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es posible que sobreviva, pero quedará lisiado de por vida. Tiene demasiados músculos carbonizados hasta el hueso; aun cuando conserve una movilidad parcial, el dolor le acompañará constantemente. Sus habilidades motoras han quedado dañadas de manera irreparable. El tiempo dirá si acaba siendo un tullido o un cadáver.{/n}

{n}Es posible que el hombre sobreviva, pero aunque lo haga quedará lisiado de por vida, el dolor y el sufrimiento son permanentes. No podrá trabajar como los demás, por lo que se verá obligado a mendigar y rebuscar comida. No podrá permitirse medicina básica, por lo que cualquier enfermedad se apoderará de su cuerpo. El dolor de sus heridas lo acompañará hasta el día de su muerte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}命は助かるかもしれないが、一生を棒に振ることになる。筋肉の大部分が骨まで黒焦げになっており、仮に動くことができても、常に痛みが付きまとうことになるだろう。運動能力は修復不可能なほど損傷している。廃人になるか死体になるか、その答えは時間しだいだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}命は助かるかもしれないが、一生を棒に振ることになる。筋肉の大部分が骨まで黒焦げになっており、仮に動くことができても、常に痛みが付きまとうことになるだろう。運動能力は修復不可能なほど損傷している。廃人になるか死体になるか、その答えは時間しだいだ。{/n}
{n}生存する可能性はある。しかしたとえ助かっても、苦しみと惨めな想いに支配される不自由な人生を送ることになるだろう。他の者のように働くことはできないだろうから、物乞いとして生きて、この先ずっと食べ物をせびるしかない。そこら辺の薬も手に入れる術は無くなるので、全ての病がその弱った体にまとわりつくことになる。傷の痛みは死ぬまで続くのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他或许能存活下来，但会落下终身残疾。他绝大部分肌肉都被烧焦了，烧得只剩下骨头。就算他勉强还能动，疼痛也会时时刻刻侵扰着他。他的运动能力遭到了严重损害，再也无法复原。他究竟会伤痕累累地活下来，还是会一命呜呼？时间很快就能给出答案。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他或许能存活下来，但会落下终身残疾。他绝大部分肌肉都被烧焦了，烧得只剩下骨头。就算他勉强还能动，疼痛也会时时刻刻侵扰着他。他的运动能力遭到了严重损害，再也无法复原。他究竟会伤痕累累地活下来，还是会一命呜呼？时间很快就能给出答案。{/n}
{n}这个人说不定能活下来，但就算他真的能活下来，他的一生也必将充满痛苦、不幸。他注定无法像其他人一样工作，这意味着他将不得不乞讨，每时每刻都在忙于寻找吃的东西。他根本没有办法获得最基本的药物，各种各样的病菌会不断感染他那虚弱不堪的身体。他的伤口带来的痛苦会始终折磨着他，直到他死去的那一天才会结束。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vielleicht überlebt er, aber er wird für sein Leben gezeichnet sein. Zu viele seiner Muskeln sind bis auf die Knochen verbrannt ... selbst, wenn er sich eingschränkt wieder bewegen kann, wird Schmerz zukünftig sein ständiger Begleiter sein. Seine motorischen Fertigkeiten sind irreparabel geschädigt. Ein gebrochener oder toter Mann. Wir werden sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He might survive, but he will be maimed for life. Too much of his muscle has been charred down to the bone — even if he does retain some ability to move, pain will be his constant companion. His motor skills have been damaged beyond repair. A broken man or a corpse, time will soon tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vielleicht überlebt er, aber er wird für sein Leben gezeichnet sein. Zu viele seiner Muskeln sind bis auf die Knochen verbrannt ... selbst, wenn er sich eingschränkt wieder bewegen kann, wird Schmerz zukünftig sein ständiger Begleiter sein. Seine motorischen Fertigkeiten sind irreparabel geschädigt. Ein gebrochener oder toter Mann. Wir werden sehen.{/n}

{n}Es besteht eine Chance, dass der Mann überlebt. Aber selbst dann wird er verkrüppelt sein und ein Leben voller Schmerz und Leid führen. Er wird nie wieder arbeiten können wie die anderen und betteln müssen, ewig andere um Essen anflehen. Er wird sich simple Arzneien nicht beschaffen können, sodass jede Krankheit seinen geschwächten Körper weiter ausmergelt. Der Schmerz seiner Wunden wird bleiben bis zum Tag seines Todes.{/n}
